element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the probability of occurrence of values in each cell of a raster layer, based on the Exponential probability distribution.

element.name: MEAN
element.text: The mean value of the distribution

element.name: STDDEV
element.text: The standard deviation of the distribution

element.name: CDF
element.text: Select this option if you want the resulting values to show the accumulated probability instead of the individual one
